title: No AI used: Rockstar says GTA 6 will be ‘handcrafted’, built ‘street by street’
snippet: Rockstar Games has confirmed that generative AI will not be used in GTA VI. Take Two interactive CEO confirmed the development in a recent interview where he emphasized that the game will be handcrafted.&nbsp;

title: Sridhar Vembu advises coders to find alternative careers amid AI boom: 'I don't say this in panic…'
snippet: Sridhar Vembu of Zoho advises coders to seek alternative careers as AI technology advances. Vembu was replying to a post by a user on social media who had managed to create a Bhagawad Gita app without having any coding language.

title: iPhone 18 Pro Max leak: Apple eyes its biggest-ever battery, but it's half the size of Chinese flagships
snippet: The upcoming iPhone 18 Pro Max is rumored to come with an over 5,000mAh battery capacity. Meanwhile, Chinese phones have constantly been improving their battery capacities and some devices have been breached the 10,000 mAh mark.&nbsp;

title: SpaceX delays Mars plans to focus on 2027 moon landing: Report
snippet: The company will ‌target March 2027 for a lunar landing without astronauts on board, the report added. The news comes after SpaceX agreed to acquire xAI ​in a deal that values ​the rocket and satellite company at $1 ‌trillion and ‍the artificial intelligence outfit at $250 billion.

title: US, China opt out of joint declaration on AI use in military
snippet: Around a third of countries attending a military AI summit agreed on Thursday to a declaration on how to govern deployment of the technology in warfare, but ‌military heavyweights China ‌and the US opted out.
